newsitem.title: UK: Kwik-Fit says trade in 1st 2 mths up on yr.
newsitem.headline: Kwik-Fit says trade in 1st 2 mths up on yr.

text.p: Kwik-Fit Holdings Plc, the car parts, repair and replacement specialist, said on Thursday that trading in the first two months of the current year was ahead of the same period last year.

"Whilst it is not possible to forecast how the next 10 months will develop, all of our businesses are performing well and I believe that Kwik-Fit, with its management and people is in better shape than ever," chairman Tom Farmer told the annual meeting.

He said the group was continuing to expand. In the last two months it opened eight new centres. A further 50 new outlets are planned for the current year, taking the number of operating units up to 1,100.
